document.full_text: a local leader in green building sees a revival of the rio piedad as the first step in creating a rehabilitated city glistening with the water that defined the capital before the spaniards arrived.
document.title: mexico city as a river-laced oasis
lines_and_colors: a local leader in green building sees a revival of the rio piedad as the first step in creating a rehabilitated city glistening with the water that defined the capital before the spaniards arrived.
